info.title: Navigate forwards to a spin button in reading mode

setupScript.name: setFocusBeforeSpinButtonAndSetPredefinedDate
setupScript.description: sets the date picker to March 19, 2021, hides the previous/next arrow buttons and sets focus on a link before the 'Day' spin button

user: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Day' spin button.
instructions.raw: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Day' spin button.
instructions.mode: Verify the Virtual Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn on the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.

assertions.expectation: Name of the group is conveyed as: 'Choose a Date current value is Friday, March nineteenth, 2021'
